title: Correction: Transcriptional programming of lipid and amino acid metabolism by the skeletal muscle circadian clock

Notice of Republication

This article was republished on September 7, 2018, to correct the article type to "Methods and Resources". The publisher apologizes for this error. The scientific content of the article has not changed.
